page.title: 01OUR PART OF LOUGHBOROUGH
page.content: Our part of{Loughborough}takes you from the{industrial centre}out to the {open countryside}around the tiny {village of Cotes. }To the South of the railway line is an area dominated by{industry}including{knitwear, {engineering and chemicals. }All these industries are using more and more {computer technology}to improve their production and sales techniques. Next to the railway is the{Brush {Factory Complex}employing nearly 4000 people and dominating the area with its{heavy engineering. Beyond the railway is{farm land which is mostly{intensively managed {arable land. }The area is dominated by the 2000 acre{Prestwold estate.
